reviews.review_msg: Great guy, interesting course. Thomas explains the material clearly and the readings are an excellent addition to the broader course content. However, he can mark on the tougher side, and it takes him a long time to respond to your emails and to get papers/exams back to you. Still a solid prof though!

Very academic guy. Made the subject material inaccessible and kept expectations intentionally vague. Time alloted for tests was short but questions long. He seemed to think he was teaching a graduate course instead of an undergrad one??

There was a lot of material to cover in this course so lectures were crammed with information and it was easy to zone out.  The weekly tutorial questions were okay but sometimes it felt like he was looking for a specific answer to a broad question.  Likes to put big questions that asks for many examples on his exams.

The hardest professor I have ever had. He's an absolute academic genius, and unfortunately expects you to live up to that kind of standard. Dense, difficult, lengthy readings. Exams which ask you to basically write a research paper from knowledge. Nice guy, but really, he needs to lower himself to his students' level - the problem is that he can't.

He was a really nice guy, but was extremely disorganized and very confusing. i found that there was too much information to wrap your mind around important facts. Also, his complusive lateness and lengthy marking periods I found to be unprofessional.

A nice person, and will give a lot of help if you ask for it.  His marking style is a bit strange; extremely hard on essays, but very easy on in-class exams.  His lecture style is disorganized  and confusing, and it is difficult to take notes.  A bit biased as well when it comes to certain issues.

This prof is grounded in ambiguity- he is not sure whether or not to give equal weight to lectures or readings. He is disorganized, yet extremely intelligent; very rigid and unwilling to give second chances to those who wish to work hard. A great critic for someone willing to take criticism.
Wonderful prof who is extremely knowledgeable and kind. He is always making time to help students by providing extra office hrs during exams. He's got a great sense of humor too!
